ðŸ“– Summary: Unsend is an open-source email sending infrastructure that leverages Amazon SES to provide a reliable and cost-effective alternative to services like Resend and Sendgrid. It offers a comprehensive dashboard for monitoring email delivery metrics, managing contacts, and sending both transactional and marketing emails. Unsend also supports SMTP and a REST API, with plans to expand to other sending protocols like SMS and push notifications.
